bike.description: Specialized E5 SLX aluminum, fully manipulated tubing, smooth weld semi-compact race design, shaped TT, 1.5" lower bearing, internal cable routing, integrated headset, threaded BB

components.description: S-Works FACT carbon legs, alloy crown and steerer, 1-1/2" lower bearing
1-1/8" upper and 1-1/5" lower Cr-Mo cartridge bearings integrated w/ headset, 8mm cone spacer with 20mm of spacers
Specialized Comp, FACT carbon w/ Zertz insert, aluminum head, two-bolt clamp, 27.2mm
Chain stay protector, chain catcher, derailleur hanger, clear coat, owners manual
